actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for cost-of-living adjustments in the amount of the personal exemption and in the individual tax rates.
short_title: Anti Inflation Tax Relief Act of 1980

summary.text: Anti-Inflation Tax Relief Act of 1980 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for annual cost-of-living adjustments to the individual income tax rates, the zero bracket amount, minimum tax return filing requirements, and the $1,000 personal tax exemption.

titles.title: Anti Inflation Tax Relief Act of 1980
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for cost-of-living adjustments in the amount of the personal exemption and in the individual tax rates.
